explains: adj. 难以辨认的，无法识别的

sentences.en: He was unrecognizable without his beard.
sentences.cn: 他刮掉胡子，无人认得出他了。

sentences.en: Today that same hotel is almost unrecognizable.
sentences.cn: 如今那同一家旅馆几乎无法辨认了。

sentences.en: The unrecognizable remains of a man had been found.
sentences.cn: 发现了一具无法辨认的男子的遗体。
